document.title: Header comment
document.paragraph:
In the header comment field you can type a description of the feature. For style guidelines in writing a header comment, see:
http://www.eiffel.com/doc/oosc/ Object-Oriented Software Construction, Second Edition , paragraph 26.4. The description should be informative, clear and terse.
For example, suppose you have an attribute count. You can enter the following header comment:
/images/eiffelstudio/dialogs_and_wizards/feature-wizard-comment.png
When clicking OK this code is generated:
count: INTEGER -- Number of students in course
